channel.title: [508] NPC Chatbox speech help
channel.description:
Hey, I made a Gypsy Aris spawn talk, but I don't know how to make her say 2 things. Like this:
[IMG]http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo13/CarnagePK/GypsyAris.jpg[/img]
*Player clicks Click here to continue*
[IMG]http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo13/CarnagePK/GypsyAris2.jpg[/img]
ATM it only says one or the other. :P. If you know how please tell me :)
Oh and also if you know how I make players reply it would help if you told me that too ;)
E.G:
Select an option
Yes please
No thanks
-------------------------------------- | | | Yes Please |PlayersHead| | | | |________________________________|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 09:25:17 pm[/size][hr]And as usual, I don't get a reply... *sigh*[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 09:39:48 pm[/size][hr][quote="King Lingerz"]Hey, I made a Gypsy Aris spawn talk, but I don't know how to make her say 2 things. Like this:
[IMG]http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo13/CarnagePK/GypsyAris.jpg[/img]
*Player clicks Click here to continue*
[IMG]http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo13/CarnagePK/GypsyAris2.jpg[/img]
ATM it only says one or the other. :P. If you know how please tell me :)
Oh and also if you know how I make players reply it would help if you told me that too ;)
E.G:
Select an option
Yes please
No thanks
-------------------------------------- | | | Yes Please |PlayersHead| | | | |________________________________|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 09:25:17 pm[/size][hr]And as usual, I don't get a reply... *sigh*[/quote]Sigh... Let me guess... It's not even possible... Figures.
